discourse_list.title: Gitcoin Digest #39: Halloween weekend, plus multiple hackathons running on Gitcoin this week! \xf0\x9f\x91\xbb

content.content: 1442×260 92.3 KB  Halloween weekend, and multiple hackathons running on Gitcoin!   How can we improve the digest? Leave your feedback here.  What’s Happening in the DAO This Week   DAO Stewards V2 vote has passed – The proposal to update protocols and processes for DAO Stewards passed. Folks in the comments are currently asking, “Should we increase minimum compensation for DAO Stewards?”  The Open Data Science hackathon continues through the 31st. Check it out by going to #start-here in the Discord and selecting the Hackathon and Events role, then dropping into the #fdd-hackathon channel!  The Reserve Protocol x Gitcoin hackathon began on 10/25, and runs through 12/7. Join and hack with others on the future of asset-backed currencies. $250k in total prizes. Get involved here.  There is a Snapshot vote up to ratify GR16 round structure. Read the proposal and vote here.    607×647 251 KB  Meme by McKennedy.eth  In This Issue of the Digest   Hot Topics   Twitter Roundup   New Posts in the Governance Forum   This Week’s GreenPill Episodes     New and Active Governance Proposals  Upcoming Events   If you’d like to get the Digest in your inbox, sign up here. And now, this week’s Hot Topics!  1280×714 383 KB     Hot Topics A roundup of interesting topics of the past week from within the GitcoinDAO ecosystem.   From Twitter   As mentioned above, the Reserve Protocol Hackathon began this week on 10/25. If you missed the Twitter Space kicking off the hackathon, you can listen to it here.   The Elysium Hackathon, also hosted on Gitcoin, runs from 11/1-11/28. Join others to build on Everscale, a fast, scalable, and fully decentralized 5th-gen blockchain. $40k in prizes. Learn more here.    Lastly, Quadratic Voting is now available on Snapshot       From the Governance Forum   Knowledge Transfer: Characterizing the Sybil Resistance Problem, by Owocki This post was originally posted on August 5th. Disruption Joe dropped this link to Owocki and Kevin Olsen’s talk at DevCon Bogotá 2022, titled “1 Human, 1 Vote  Money Legos”. Joe encourages devs to check out the developer focused presentation on Passport, which begins about 26 minutes into the video.   Proposal: V2 of the Steward Council, by shawn16400 This proposal to create new processes and structure for the Steward Council has gone to a Snapshot vote and passed, with 99.83% voting ‘for’! However, there is still a lively discussion in the comments. Join the Discussion.     Latest Episodes from Green Pill    Green Pill #56 | Democracy with Decentralized Identity with Paula Berman – Kevin is joined by Paula Berman who talks about cultivating web3 era democracy with decentralized identity. Paula is a hacktivist, digital identity geek and COO of RadicalxChange. Paula shares how she went from civic tech to web3, why she wrote the paper, “Who Watches the Watchmen?” why it’s important, and so much more.     Gitcoin Governance Overview Snapshot polls GTC Holders and Tally performs on-chain actions. Proposals that have on-chain steps, such as budget requests, move on to Tally after being ratified on Snapshot.  Active Proposals:   GR16 Round Structure – Runs until Oct 27, 2022, 10:00 PM ET (Snapshot)   Proposal Discussions:  None this week.   Latest Completed Proposals:   Version 2 of the Steward Council – Passed with 99.83% ‘For’ (Snapshot)    Upcoming Community Events If you have an event you’d like us to include in the Digest, reach out to @alexdw5 on Twitter or Discord. Every Wednesday:   12p ET – DAO VIBES – our weekly open community vibes call. Happens in the Citizen Forum on Discord.  Every Thursday:   1p ET - Gitcoin Gathering – Gitcoin Gathering is a series of personal development workshops led by Jon and Laura! Open to Core and Trusted Contributors. Let Saf know if you have any Trusted Contributors to add to the calendar invite!  For up-to-the-minute updates on Gitcoin events, check out our Events Calendar!   New to GitcoinDAO?   TLDR - What is Gitcoin?   Become a Gitcoin Citizen!   Sign up here to get the Gitcoin Digest in your inbox.  Help us improve the Gitcoin Digest by interacting with this pol.is! Add your statements and vote on what others have put forward. Remember to check back regularly to vote on new statements. Thank you!  Previous edition

alexdwagner:   Owocki posted this introductory post to web3studio, his new venture, and the various projects they’re working on right now, from public speaking and media, to SimpleGrants, Impact Certificates, building Sybil-resistant dApps, creating a “How to DAO” book with Puncar, and more! Owocki has some asks for the various projects. Check out the post to see if you can help!    heads up this is an old post, it was just bumped up by someone commenting on it. web3studio has been rebranded to supermodular. please see this announcement video or this announcement tweet thread for more.
Hey Kevin, thanks for catching this! That’s my error. I’ve deleted that link to the old forum post I initially included here.

周报#39中文版，欢迎订阅并关注中文twtitter（@GitcoinCN）参与互动！   news.gitcoinchina.com    DAO newsletter - Issue #39 万圣节周末！以及在 Gitcoin 上运行的多个黑客马拉松。首先**，这是本周 DAO 中发生的事情：**DAO Stewards V2 投票已通过——更新 DAO Stewards 协议和流程的提案获得通过。评论中的人目前在问，“我们是否应该提高 DAO Stewards 的最低薪酬？”开放数据科学黑客马拉松将持续到 31 日。前往Discord 中的#start-here并选择 Hackathon 和 Events 角色，然后进入#fdd-hackathon频道查看！Reserve...      中文可以订阅周报： http://news.gitcoinchina.com/
